as_user.desc: Pass true to delete the message as the authed user with `chat:write:user` scope. Bot users in this context are considered authed users. If unused or false, the message will be deleted with `chat:write:bot` scope.

channel.desc: Channel containing the message to be deleted.

ts.desc: Timestamp of the message to be deleted.

errors.cant_delete_message: Authenticated user does not have permission to delete this message.
errors.message_not_found: No message exists with the requested timestamp.
